metadata.dc:author: Lema Grille, J
Durana Tonder, C
Rodríguez Núñez, H
Blanco Parra, M
Cimadevila García, A
metadata.dc:description: Among the adult bladder sarcomas it's extremely rare as an histological variety the malignant fibrous histiocytoma. We present a case of a 25 years old young male with bladder and prostate both affected, successfully treated with radical surgery and poliquimiotherapy. We also reviewed the bibliography about this neoplasias up to now.
metadata.dc:title: Histiocitoma fibroso maligno vesicoprostático.
[Malignant vesico-prostatic fibrous histiocytoma].
